name: Hytale Dedicated Server (Refined)
author: micheal@rushlabs.com
description: Hytale Dedicated Server configured according to the official Hypixel Studios manual. Requires Java 25 and UDP Port 5520.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Hytale Server Installation Script

apt update
apt install -y curl unzip

if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then
    echo "Downloading server from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}..."
    curl -L "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" -o server.zip
    unzip server.zip
    rm server.zip
else
    echo "No Download URL provided. Please upload HytaleServer.jar manually via SFTP."
fi

echo "Installation complete."

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the main server jar file.

variables.name: Download URL
variables.description: URL to download the server zip (if available).

variables.name: Override Session Token
variables.description: Optional: For Server Providers using the API auth flow.

variables.name: Override Identity Token
variables.description: Optional: For Server Providers using the API auth flow.
